document.full_text: oil prices ended at 2-1/2-year highs on thursday as supply worries tied to fighting in libya and middle east turmoil overshadowed demand concerns spurred by a boost in euro zone interest rates and as a major aftershock struck japan.
document.title: oil rises to 2-1/2 high on mideast turmoil
lines_and_colors: oil prices ended at 2-1/2-year highs on thursday as supply worries tied to fighting in libya and middle east turmoil overshadowed demand concerns spurred by a boost in euro zone interest rates and as a major aftershock struck japan.
